title: Doomsday Diaries IV: Luke and the Lion
description: No longer constrained by his earthly body, Luke transcends his human existence. He passes through time, giving aid to those who would secure his fate, and setting the stage for the final battle between the righteous and the wicked.But as King Winthrop closes his icy grip around the last surviving humans, the Great Counselors of the world have summoned a higher power. The Lion is coming.
author: Aaron B. Powell
